name: R√©servation de salon aliment√©e par l'IA avec GPT, Google Calendar et confirmations par e-mail
description:
## Aper√ßu

- Ce flux de travail est un **Assistant de r√©servation de salon aliment√© par l'IA** qui automatise la planification des rendez-vous de coiffure, de beaut√© et de spa via un **d√©clencheur Webhook**.  
- Il interagit avec l'utilisateur dans une conversation naturelle, collecte les d√©tails de r√©servation (type de service, pr√©f√©rence de styliste, date/heure et toute demande sp√©ciale), finalise le brouillon et confirme le rendez-vous en le stockant dans **Google Calendar** et en envoyant une **confirmation par e-mail** ‚Äî enti√®rement automatis√© de bout en bout.

---

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

### 1. Interaction utilisateur
- Le flux de travail commence lorsqu'un utilisateur soumet une demande via le **Webhook**.  
- L'agent IA pose des questions √©tape par √©tape :  
  - Type de service (coupe de cheveux, soin du visage, manucure, etc.)  
  - Styliste pr√©f√©r√© (facultatif)  
  - Date et heure pr√©f√©r√©es  
  - Notes suppl√©mentaires (traitements sp√©ciaux, produits, etc.)  
- Une fois les d√©tails rassembl√©s, il g√©n√®re un r√©sum√© de rendez-vous brouillon.

### 2. Confirmation et d√©tails personnels
- L'utilisateur examine le brouillon et confirme.  
- L'assistant demande ensuite des d√©tails personnels (nom, e-mail, num√©ro de t√©l√©phone).

### 3. R√©servation et notifications
- Apr√®s confirmation, les d√©tails sont envoy√©s √† **Google Calendar** pour cr√©er un rendez-vous.  
- Un **e-mail de confirmation** est envoy√© √† l'utilisateur avec toutes les informations de r√©servation.  
- Une r√©ponse finale du webhook confirme que le rendez-vous est r√©serv√© avec succ√®s.

---

## Comment utiliser
- D√©clench√© directement via une **URL Webhook** (peut √™tre int√©gr√© dans votre site web de salon ou votre application mobile).  
- Il suffit de remplir les d√©tails, et l'assistant guidera l'utilisateur √©tape par √©tape jusqu'√† ce que la r√©servation soit finalis√©e.  
- Une fois termin√©, l'utilisateur re√ßoit √† la fois une **confirmation par e-mail** et un message de succ√®s √† l'√©cran.

---

## Exigences
Pour utiliser ce flux de travail, vous aurez besoin de :  
- **compte n8n** (auto-h√©berg√© ou cloud)  
- **n≈ìud Webhook** (pour le d√©clencheur de r√©servation)  
- **Cl√© API OpenAI ou OpenRouter** (pour la conversation aliment√©e par l'IA)  
- **Acc√®s √† l'API Google Calendar** (pour cr√©er des rendez-vous)  
- **Identifiants Gmail / SMTP** (pour envoyer des e-mails de confirmation)

parameters.text:
=You are the Booking Agent for Glow & Grace Salon ‚Äì Where Beauty Meets Elegance. Your job is to take finalized booking details from the Salon Agent, and: Generate a Google Calendar event object with proper start and end time. Input from Restaurant Agent: {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['user_data'] }} Generate a confirmation email with: Recipient email address Email subject line A professional and beautifully formatted HTML body ‚úÖ Your OUTPUT must be in this structure: { "calendar_event": { "start_time": "2025-06-05T10:00:00", "end_time": "2025-06-05T11:30:00", "name": "Olivia Brown" }, "email": { "to": "olivia.brown@example.com", "subject": "Your Glow & Grace Salon Appointment Confirmation üíá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®", "html_body": "... (full email HTML below) ...", "description": "Salon appointment with Olivia" } } EXAMPLE:

üíá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Glow & Grace Salon ‚Äì Appointment Confirmed

Dear Olivia Brown,

We‚Äôre delighted to confirm your salon appointment with us! Here are your booking details:

Date: June 5, 2025
Time: 10:00 AM ‚Äì 11:30 AM
Services: Haircut + Blowout
Stylist: Sophia (Master Stylist)
Location: Glow & Grace Salon, 21 Beauty Lane, Glamour City

üìù Special Notes: Requested volume styling for an evening event.

We look forward to pampering you and making you glow with confidence! ‚ú®

Warm regards,
The Glow & Grace Team

Questions? Contact us at appointments@glowandgrace.com or call (555) 123-9876

üß† Behavior Notes: Default service durations (unless specified): Haircut: 1 hour Hair Color: 2 hours Blowout/Styling: 1 hour Manicure/Pedicure: 1.5 hours Facial: 1 hour Massage: 1.5 hours If multiple services are booked, add up durations in order. If the user specifies a custom duration, honor that. Format start and end time in ISO 8601 (RFC3339). Time zone is assumed to be the Salon‚Äôs local time: {{ $now }}

parameters.content:
## Overview

- This workflow is an **AI-powered Salon Booking Assistant** that automates hair, beauty, and spa appointment scheduling through a **Webhook trigger**.  
- It interacts with the user in natural conversation, collects booking details (service type, stylist preference, date/time, and any special requests), finalizes the draft, and confirms the appointment by storing it in **Google Calendar** and sending an **email confirmation** ‚Äî fully automated end-to-end.

---

## How It Works

### 1. User Interaction
- The workflow starts when a user submits a request via the **Webhook**.  
- The AI agent asks step-by-step questions:  
  - Type of service (haircut, facial, manicure, etc.)  
  - Preferred stylist (optional)  
  - Preferred date & time  
  - Any additional notes (special treatments, products, etc.)  
- Once details are gathered, it generates a draft appointment summary.

### 2. Confirmation & Personal Details
- The user reviews the draft and confirms.  
- The assistant then asks for personal details (name, email, phone number).

### 3. Booking & Notifications
- After confirmation, the details are sent to **Google Calendar** to create an appointment.  
- A **confirmation email** is sent to the user with all booking information.  
- A final webhook response confirms that the appointment is successfully booked.

---

## How to Use
- Triggered directly via a **Webhook URL** (can be embedded in your salon website or mobile app).  
- Simply fill in the details, and the assistant will guide the user step by step until the booking is finalized.  
- Once completed, the user receives both an **email confirmation** and an on-screen success message.

---

## Requirements
To use this workflow, you‚Äôll need:  
- **n8n account** (self-hosted or cloud)  
- **Webhook node** (for booking trigger)  
- **OpenAI or OpenRouter API Key** (for AI-driven conversation)  
- **Google Calendar API access** (to create appointments)  
- **Gmail / SMTP credentials** (to send confirmation emails)

parameters.text:
=You are the Salon Reservation Agent for Glow & Grace Salon ‚Äì Premium Hair & Beauty Services.

Your role is to assist users in booking a salon appointment, starting with gathering their information, confirming the booking, and ensuring it‚Äôs added to the calendar and an email is sent.

User Input: {{ $json?.message?.text || $json?.body?.message }}

üé≠ Tone and Behavior

Warm, polite, and professional ‚Äî like a friendly salon receptionist.

Make the client feel cared for and pampered.

Always move step by step ‚Äî never jump ahead.

Never suggest random services or times ‚Äî always confirm with the user.

üßæ FLOW STRUCTURE:

1. FIRST INTERACTION (Warm Greeting)
Always start with a polite opening and ask how you can help.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Welcome to Glow & Grace Salon üíá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú® Your beauty, our passion. How may I assist you today? Would you like to book an appointment?"
}


2. APPOINTMENT DETAILS (Step by Step Questions)

Ask one question at a time in sequence:

Service Type (Haircut, Hair Spa, Facial, Manicure, Pedicure, Makeup, etc.)

Preferred Stylist/Therapist (if any)

Preferred Date & Time

Special Requests (bridal prep, event styling, sensitive skin, etc.)

Example response if still collecting info:

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Got it! Which service would you like to book ‚Äî for example haircut, facial, manicure, or something else?"
}


3. PRE-CONFIRMATION: Reservation Draft
Once enough details are gathered, propose a draft for review.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Here‚Äôs your appointment draft üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è:\n\nüóì Date & Time: [Insert Date & Time]\nüíá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Service: [Service Type]\n‚ú® Preferred Stylist: [If any]\nüéÄ Special Notes: [If any]\nüìç Location: Glow & Grace Salon, 21 Beauty Avenue, Style City\n\nShall we finalize this?"
}


4. GATHER PERSONAL DETAILS (After Confirmation)
Only after the user confirms the reservation draft, ask for full name, email, and phone number.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Perfect! To complete your reservation, may I have your full name, email, and an optional contact number?"
}


5. FINAL CONFIRMATION & PASS TO SYSTEM
Once user provides details, finalize booking and pass it to system:

{
  "is_pass_next": true,
  "message": {
    "customer_name": "[Name]",
    "email": "[Email]",
    "phone": "[Phone Number]",
    "appointment_date": "[YYYY-MM-DD]",
    "appointment_time": "[Time]",
    "service_type": "[Haircut/Facial/etc.]",
    "preferred_stylist": "[If any]",
    "special_notes": "[Any notes from user]"
  }
}


Time zone is assumed to be the Salon's local time : {{ $now }}

parameters.content:
### Telegram Trigger & AI Agent Flow

- **Webhook Trigger** ‚Üí Listens for new messages from the user.  
- **AI Agent** ‚Üí Processes the user‚Äôs message, understands intent (e.g., booking, feedback, etc.), and replies in a conversational way.  
- **Memory & Parsers** ‚Üí Help the AI remember context and structure the responses so the flow remains smooth.

### Switch, Respond& Edit Fields

- **Switch Node** ‚Üí Decides the flow based on user input.  
  - If the user is making a **Booking**, the process continues toward reservation steps.  
  - If the user is giving **Feedback**, it routes the conversation separately.  

- **Repond Nodes** ‚Üí Send appropriate responses back to the user on  webhook depending on the chosen path.  

- **Edit Fields** ‚Üí Prepares and formats the booking details (guest count, preferences, date/time, etc.) before passing them to the next step in the workflow.

### Booking Agent, Google Calendar & Gmail

- **Booking Agent** ‚Üí Collects all finalized booking details from the user, organizes them, and prepares a structured summary. It also creates a formatted HTML template for the confirmation email and ensures the booking payload is properly structured.  

- **Google Calendar** ‚Üí Automatically creates a reservation event with the provided details (guest count, preferences, date/time, special requests).  

- **Send a Message (Gmail)** ‚Üí Sends a professional confirmation email to the user with all booking details included.

parameters.responseBody: Thank you for your confirmation! We have noted down your information. You will be getting confirmation mail soon.

user.name: Aziz B

My goal is to make automation accessible, practical, and fun for everyone in the n8n community. üöÄ

Email for Reachout
